"A.P.238/4/9/12:30": "That's enough! That was great! You really showed me how hard you work!"
"...Hmm. Your performance was a little lacking!"
"But your spirit took you right to the finish line! That's all ARKS need!"
"You didn't win and you don't get the exhibition match, but your spirit proved itself!"
"Now, head on home! Everyone is waiting for you!"
"A flawless result! This was a brilliant plan! I'm a genius!"
"Well, it was really down to your effort as participants!"
"I've prepared a special reward, just for you!"
"And your reward... is a mock battle with me!"
"You will have the honour of training with one of the Council of Six! Now, come at me with all your strength!"
"...Sorry, but I'll refuse that reward."
"Such apathy! Hey, hey! You've given it your all so far, so keep on going to the end!"
"Besides, I want to see how strong you are!"
"No, you don't need to know that."
"That's not right! I'm Sixth of the Council of Six! It's my job to know everything about ARKS!"
"Like you there... I know about <%me> to an extent!"
"But you, Sara! You know what, I've never even seen you before!"
"And that means you can't possibly be in ARKS!"
"Because I see everyone in ARKS and I remember them! Although I often forget their names!"
"You forgot faces too, didn't you."
"No way!"
"...So, are you bringing me in?"
"No, of course not! You might not be in ARKS, but you still have a heart of justice!"
"So that's what I want to confirm! Your spirit of justice!"
"Huh... you're a pain. At the end of the day, you just want to fight."
"You can think so if you want! After all, fighting and helping people are all I can do!"
"Sorry <%me>, it looks like we have to do this."
"All right, let's go!"
